category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: BOMExcludeFromPackCheck
preference.preference_description: Defines which attributes are ignored during the default pack check. For example, set this preference to seqno to allow the exclusion of find numbers from the BOM line pack check. Valid Values: seqno - Excludes find numbers from the BOM line pack check. Allows BOM lines with distinct find numbers to be packed. none - No attributes are ignored during the default pack check. BOM lines must have the same part number and the find number to be packed.
